name: Lintalho
description:
A survival local co-op game.

Trapped in this cold cave of despair and isolation, you absolutely must escape. For should you fail, the behemoth that patiently awaits you will drag your soul into the depths of despair for all eternity!

Grace to the gods, for you feel like you can jump really high, maybe even twice… Can you utilise your deductive reasoning and acrobatic prowess to escape from death itself?

Sacrifice everything for freedom, or die trying.

Your choice.

Controls Tips
  • Hold the jump button to jump higher
  • You can double jump
  • Click on your skills to sacrifice them
  • The game might be impossible to finish without certain skills!
Developer comments
  • The game have so much potential. However, time constraint doesn't allow for better puzzles. -Vija02
  • Sacrifice what? - Meng
  • We sacrifice our life for you -Zxinferno
  • Wheres japanese shaman girl -soundpulse

Good luck, have fun!
